Replace.Text: Why didn't you tell me earlier, I mean why tell me now?
Meaningless things
The Sifangyuan is willing to grant you some special rights, but this is not my idea....
I see
I told those people not to waste their time on you.
Don't even think about touching a hair on my head!
You shouldn't exist in this world!
Let them come in and sit by themselves, I still need to do research...
You can ask other people in Sifangyuan. I am busy.
The researchers from Sifangyuan are heading to your territory. I hope you can entertain them well.
How dare such a vulgar person speak so rudely?
shameless!
I have taught you so many times, how could you still make a mistake? Take it back and review it again... Hello, what do you want to talk to me about?
Are you here to visit the Sifangyuan? Just follow me.
Yes, you can
Where are you from? Can you mark your location on the map?
So many troops, are they here to attack us?
Really? Why don't I believe it?
Your expansion has affected us.
In this case, I have nothing to say.
Stealing the secrets of the Sifangyuan is no joke. I advise you not to do it again next time.
I have nothing to say.
When will your religious people leave?
If it weren't for this body...
It's a pleasure to work with, it's good for both of us
It's a pleasure to work with, it's good for both of us
It's a pleasure to work with, it's good for both of us
forget about it
forget about it
forget about it
It's ridiculous that I'm discussing international affairs with a completely uneducated guy.
Zhiming sneers at your low cultural values
Tianyuan Divine Realm-Mystery
Divine Realm Tianyuan
Zhiming
Um... why are you acting like a child...? Childish.
Zhuanxu Secret Method

Immediately after creating the capital, you will gain Zhiming and Gengchen. Cities with Sifangyuan will gain +2 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points, +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points for Libraries, +3 [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work Slots, +3 [ICON_Science] Research Value for Works, +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture Value, and -100% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism Performance. After winning a battle, you will gain [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points equal to 20% of the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of the killed unit, and all units will gain experience points normally when killing barbarian units. The Ring of Reason will gain -5 [ICON_Gold] gold coins per turn, but the purchase cost of [ICON_Gold] will be -100%, +9999% [ICON_Production] productivity when building a space center, and +7000% [ICON_Production] productivity when executing space projects.
How durable is the magnetic lining under natural conditions? Phew… I know that, but I don’t want to tell you now. Think about it yourself. — Zhiming
Knowledgeable
I hate civilizations with low culture values.
[COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] -5 [ICON_Gold] gold coins (maintenance fee) [ENDCOLOR] per turn, from the wise leader trait
